Headline: #50 Damen Temporary Reroute at Damen/15th
ShortDescription: 50 Damen buses are temporarily rerouted via Damen, Roosevelt, Ashland, 18th and Damen, due to street blockage near Damen/15th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#50 Damen buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Damen, Roosevelt, Ashland, 18th and Damen, due to street blockage near Damen/15th.

Allow extra travel time.
